improvement_list.improvement_desc: The inner loop (lines 16-17) has zero execution frequency according to the annotation.  This suggests a logic error in how the program determines when to enter the inner loop.  The condition controlling the loop should be reviewed.
Line 19 has zero execution frequency according to the annotations, meaning the line is unreachable. This is likely due to the same logic error identified in the previous inner loop.
The print statement on line 20 also shows zero execution frequency.  It is important to determine why the main loop never completes a full iteration and makes it to this print statement.

The `elif len(nums) == 1` block (line 13) has zero execution frequency. This implies that the program does not handle the case of a list with one element, which is inconsistent with the provided test cases.  The condition and the logic within this block should be reviewed.
